wrath.util

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.PrintStream
          • wrath.util.Logger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.Appendable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class Logger
extends java.io.PrintStream
    Flexible and expandable logging system. Includes Time stamps, console verbose and file logging.

        Constructor.

      • Logger

        public Logger(boolean timeStamp)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        timeStamp - If true, a time stamp and the name of the logger will be displayed before the output is printed.

      • Logger

        Constructor.

        logFile - The File to save the log to.

      • Logger

        public Logger(java.io.File logFile,
              boolean timeStamp,
              boolean writeToConsole,
              boolean writeToFile)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        logFile - The File to save the log to.
        timeStamp - If true, a time stamp and the name of the logger will be displayed before the output is printed.
        writeToConsole - If true, outputs to the console.
        writeToFile - If true, writes to the file.

    • Method Detail

      • filterConsole

        public java.lang.String filterConsole(java.lang.String message)
        Method meant to be overridden. Method takes in original String and returns modified String to be printed. If method returns null, nothing will be printed to the console.
        Parameters:
        message - The original message to be decided whether to print or not.
        Returns:
        If a String is returned, it is what will be printed to the console. If returns null, nothing is printed.

      • filterLog

        public java.lang.String filterLog(java.lang.String message)
        Method meant to be overridden. Method takes in original String and returns modified String to be printed. If method returns null, nothing will be printed to the log file.
        Parameters:
        message - The original message to be decided whether to print or not.
        Returns:
        If a String is returned, it is what will be printed to the log file. If returns null, nothing is printed.

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        If true, the logger is saved and closed, and cannot be written to anymore.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the logger is closed.

      • registerOutputLogger

        public static void registerOutputLogger(Logger logger)
        Changes the System's standard output, to replace System.out.
        Parameters:
        logger - The Logger to make the system's standard output. If null, resets the System.out logger back to default.

      • registerErrorLogger

        public static void registerErrorLogger(Logger logger)
        Changes the System's standard error output, to replace System.err.
        Parameters:
        logger - The Logger to make the system's standard error output. If null, resets the System.err logger back to default.
